page.title: 15DAY IN A LIFE OF A TEACHER
page.content: My name is Mrs Johnson I am a teacher at Houghton Regis Upper School.I get up in the morning to get my baby and myself ready,I check that I have got everything that I will need for the day.I take the baby next door,then I get in my car and go and pick up another teacher.When we get to school we both go to the briefing.I go and do the register then I check my timetable,if I am on cover I go to cover for the teacher that is away otherwise I go to my normal lessons.At dinner time I go home to feed my baby then I come back to do my register.I teach more lessons and then I do the final register.Ithen go home to feed my baby.
